definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: meaning dubious; only in [[מְּנוּ־חִיץ לְמוֹאָב]] Je 48:9 usu. (after AW Ra Ki al.) wings (coll.) (cf. Aram. [[חִיץ]] wing, fin, Thes Gf al.); cf. Perles:Anal.46, who reads [[נוֹחִיץ]] (wing-) feathers (as in Aram.); LXX shmei)a, whence Gie sign-post, rdg. [[חִיוּן]],—or [[נֵם]],—(indicating flight).
